title: I liked it...
description: I liked it, but the ghost role is very hard to play. The cards are very abstract, and the ghost only has 7 cards at a time. I tried it with Dixit cards once, the result was much better (easier for the psychics also, that was the downside) but the Dixit cards are full of direct hints.

title: + Actually...
description: + Actually feels co-operative+ Accommodating player count+ Engrossing theme+ Excelent Artwork and Components+ Interpreting/giving clues is engaging+ Natural tension created in close games+ Betting on teammates is a solid mechanic- Too much game state upkeep- Long Setup- Limited Replay Value- Slightly underwhelming second phase

title: This game ...
description: This game was way more difficult that I thought it would be. Big fan of the game and I would gladly play it again. I  want more vision cards to increase replayabiliy.
